decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive Boros creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently. With a mix of low-cost creatures, removal spells, and combat tricks, the deck aims to establish early board presence and maintain pressure throughout the game. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion also adds an extra layer of versatility and consistency to the deck. By efficiently utilizing its resources and maximizing its creatures' abilities, the deck aims to close out games swiftly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. It includes creatures such as Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, as well as burn spells like Monstrous Rage and Titan's Strength. The deck also utilizes companion Jegantha, the Wellspring for additional value. The mana base is focused on black and red sources to support the color requirements of the spells. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast-paced aggression and efficient removal spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Chained to the Rocks, Enigmatic Incarnation, Leyline Binding, and Portable Hole. It also includes a companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, to provide additional card advantage and flexibility. The deck features a diverse range of creatures and spells, aiming to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a proactive game plan. With the ability to generate value and control the game, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of sacrificing creatures for value, recursion, and direct damage. By utilizing cards like Bloodtithe Harvester, Mayhem Devil, and Cauldron Familiar in conjunction with Witch's Oven, players can generate a continuous stream of damage while also disrupting their opponent's board. The inclusion of cards like Fatal Push and Claim the Firstborn helps to control the board and maintain momentum, while the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring provides an additional source of mana to further fuel the aggressive engine of the deck.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a fast-paced aggressive strategy using Spirit creature cards. By utilizing cards like Mausoleum Wanderer, Spell Queller, and Supreme Phantom, you can quickly build a board presence and apply pressure to your opponent. Additionally, cards like Rattlechains and Skyclave Apparition provide disruption and removal options to control the game in your favor. The deck also includes various lands and spells to support the aggressive strategy and ensure a consistent game plan.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly amassing a strong board presence by playing low-cost creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves. The deck also utilizes disruptive creatures like Elite Spellbinder and Archon of Emeria to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Collected Company allows the player to dig for key creatures while Kellan, Daring Traveler and Trostani, Three Whispers provide ways to gain incremental advantage. The overall strategy of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures while disrupting their game plan with creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Anointed Peacekeeper.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Bishop of Wings and Righteous Valkyrie. By casting Collected Company and utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, the deck aims to flood the board with creatures and overwhelm the opponent. Additionally, cards like Resplendent Angel and Skyclave Apparition provide additional value and removal options. The deck also includes some life gain elements with Giada, Font of Hope and Prosperous Innkeeper to outlast opponents in longer games.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively get Arclight Phoenix onto the battlefield while efficiently filling the graveyard with spells through cards like Opt and Treasure Cruise. The deck also utilizes low-cost removal spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to control the board and protect its threats. Additionally, the inclusion of Ledger Shredder helps enable the recursion of Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain card advantage to overwhelm opponents in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.
